attributes.action: Stop trying to set up an authoritarian dictatorship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the arrest of an opposition MP by counter-terrorism police
     officers, it is now clear to many of us that this administration is trying to set itself up as an authoritarian
     dictatorship. The actions undertaken by this government are
     frighteningly reminiscent of those taken by Robert Mugabe and
     other dictators around the world, in stifling political
     opposition. 

     Every action this government has taken in the past decade has
     been to increase its own power. From the House of Lords Act, to
     the banning of personal protection weapons, to arresting and
     imprisoning suspects for months without charge. Now the
     government is arresting opposition MPs who reveal information
     the government would prefer kept secret. Not official secrets,
     just information embarrassing to the government. Using
     counter-terrorism legislation no less. 

     This sort of intimidating behaviour is clearly the precursor to
     the establishment of a socialist authoritarian dictatorship,
     with Brown the almighty leader, never to be questioned.

     Resign, Prime Minister, and allow the British people to elect
     someone who can be trusted not to oppress our freedom. You are
     a disgrace to your office.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
